history.proof: intros H. apply subp_asym. - shelve. - apply sup_clos_sub.

exceptions.exn: In environment T : lattice s : Pred T H : sup_closed s Unable to unify "sup_closed s" with "[eta sup_closure s] <=p s".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: lattice
s: Pred T

Goal:
sup_closed s -> sup_closure s =p s

Premises:
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
sup_closed = fun T : lattice => [Pred s | forall d : Pred_Class, d <=p s -> sup d \In s] : forall T : lattice, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments sup_closed {T}
sup_closure = fun (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) => [Pred p | forall t : Pred T, s <=p t -> t \In sup_closed -> p \In t] : forall T : lattice, Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments sup_closure {T}
Notation lattice := Lattice.type
sup_clos_min : forall (s : Pred T) (t : Pred_Class), s <=p t -> sup_closed t -> sup_closure s <=p t
sup_clos_sub : forall s : Pred T, s <=p sup_closure s
sup_closP : forall s : Pred T, sup_closed (sup_closure s)
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
infP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), x \In s -> inf s <== x
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- Type] ?T' : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- Type] ?f : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- ?T'] ?s : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- seq ?T]
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
In_split : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq_PredType T), x \In s -> exists s1 s2 : seq T, s = s1 ++ x :: s2
In_cons : forall (T : Type) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s < -> x = y \/ x \In s
Mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : PredType T) => nosimpl (let '@PropPredType _ Pred_Sort0 toPred s as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> Mem_Pred T) in let '@exist _ _ mem _ as s0 := s return (PropPredType s0 -> Mem_Pred T) in mem) : forall (T : Type) (pT : PredType T), pT -> Mem_Pred T Arguments Mem {T}%type_scope {pT}
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
Image_inj_eqmem : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (X1 X2 : Pred A), injective f -> [Image f i | i <- X1] =p [Image f i | i <- X2] -> X1 =p X2
supE : forall s1 s2 : Pred T, s1 =p s2 -> sup s1 = sup s2
subp_asym : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> p2 <=p p1 -> p1 =p p2
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
ImageEq : forall (A B : Type) (f1 f2 : A -> B) (X : Pred A), f1 =1 f2 -> [Image f1 i | i <- X] =p [Image f2 i | i <- X]
Mem_morhp : forall (T : Type) (pT : PredType T) (x y : pT), x <~> y -> x =p y
InE : forall T : Type, (forall x y : T, x \In [:: y] <-> x = y) * (forall (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s <-> x = y \/ x \In s) * (forall (T0 : Type) (x : T0) (p : Simpl_Pred T0), (x \In p) = p x)
ImageIm : forall (A B C : Type) (f1 : B -> C) (f2 : A -> B) (X : Pred A), [Image f1 i | i <- [Image f2 i | i <- X]] =p [Image (f1 \o f2) i | i <- X]
ImageU : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (X1 X2 : Pred A), [Image f i | i <- PredU X1 X2] =p [PredU [Image f i | i <- X1] & [Image f i | i <- X2]]
Image' : forall A B : Type, Pred A -> (A -> B) -> Pred B
fun_of_Pred : forall T : Type, Pred T -> T -> Prop
Lattice.mx_sup : forall T : poset, Lattice.mixin_of T -> Pred T -> T
PredU = fun (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T) => [Pred x | xPredU p1 p2 x] : forall T : Type, Pred T -> Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments PredU {T}%type_scope
PredD = fun (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T) => [Pred x | xPredD p1 p2 x] : forall T : Type, Pred T -> Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments PredD {T}%type_scope
PredI = fun (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T) => [Pred x | xPredI p1 p2 x] : forall T : Type, Pred T -> Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments PredI {T}%type_scope
inf : forall T : lattice, Pred T -> T
subPoset : forall T : poset, Pred T -> poset
Preim = fun (T rT : Type) (f : T -> rT) (d : Pred rT) => [Pred x | xPreim f d x] : forall T rT : Type, (T -> rT) -> Pred rT -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments Preim {T rT}%type_scope _%function_scope
Pred_of_Simpl : forall T : Type, Simpl_Pred T -> Pred T
MemProp : forall T : Type, Pred T -> Mem_Pred T
SimplPred : forall T : Type, Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T
PropPredType : forall (T Pred_Sort : Type) (toPred : Pred_Sort -> Pred T), {mem : Pred_Sort -> Mem_Pred T | isMem toPred mem} -> PredType T
subp_trans : forall (T : Type) (p2 p1 p3 : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> p2 <=p p3 -> p1 <=p p3
toPred : forall (T : Type) (p : PredType T), p -> Pred T
image_spec_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : SProp), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0
image_spec_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : Prop), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0

``` 
intros T s H. apply subp_asym.
- apply H.
- apply sup_clos_sub.
```
